title: rohitgames
author: rohitgames
content: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5408175.msg60658002#msg60658002 i have seens them gone again their own promises including CEO OF GAMDOM FELIX  , they kept my 20500$ as hostage  got every evidential proof regarding this...links have pics of their CEO texting promising yet gone against his own promise and banned him knowing we dont give activity

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: If you are going to post a scam accusation then do it in the correct form. Just posting a statement without proof makes your accusation just look like slander. Code:[b][color=black]What happened:: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Scammers Profile Link: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Reference Link: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Amount Scammed: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Payment Method: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Proof of Payment: [/color][/b][b][color=black]PM/Chat Logs: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Additional Notes: [/color][/b]Fill this info out and you may have a little more credibility.

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: The thing is, your trust page doesn't give you much credibility. It would not be impossible that this time you are right and your accusation is true, as in the story of the boy who cried wolf, but seeing that you have been tagged by false accusations of this style, you should provide some weighty arguments with hard evidence for the community to believe you, and the images of the other thread are worthless.

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: I don't think chats from WhatsApp and Telegram would be enough evidence. As I have read your posts, it's pretty confusing, and you even said WhatsApp on Telegram messages, so it's kind of sketchy that even that detail is wrong. So how can you be trusted when you don't have enough proof to say that there's unfair treatment with you being blackmailed? There's no link or image to the promises made, so it's pretty weird.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: This is a case of a boy who cried wolf we cannot tell if he is telling the truth this time because he has a bad history of harassing and spreading fake news on casinos and the absence of evidence that will provide a concrete accusation, it just another of OP's harassment and baseless accusations, is he making money out of this or it is just out of habit that he keeps spreading lies.

comments.author: rohitgames
comments.body: yeah yeah Cry i am level 115 in gamdom with 8 million wagers and diamond level in stake with 16 million wagersclaiming what's right to me is what i deserve for gambling high ... when i do it i was banned  , why dont gamdom official person come refuse 2 things1) they unban me week back for start my gambling  2 ) after week of not giving any activity and just claiming rains they ban me for same reason year backkask gamdom official to refuse this same thing ,. if so ill consider what u told about me...gamdom  howly is person who started all this aka felixQuote from: robelneo on July 31, 2022, 10:17:30 AMThis is a case of a boy who cried wolf we cannot tell if he is telling the truth this time because he has a bad history of harassing and spreading fake news on casinos and the absence of evidence that will provide a concrete accusation, it just another of OP's harassment and baseless accusations, is he making money out of this or it is just out of habit that he keeps spreading lies.

comments.author: sabu99622
comments.body: even i had same issue they don't even provide evidence and just close the chat if the higher up decision is finalthey literally cant provide evidence and gave hitler rule out https://postimg.cc/gallery/RFW9XXkthey dont let others claim rain its been happening to my friends too..

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: rohitgames on July 30, 2022, 10:10:16 PMhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5408175.msg60658002#msg60658002 i have seens them gone again their own promises including CEO OF GAMDOM FELIX  , they kept my 20500$ as hostage  got every evidential proof regarding this...links have pics of their CEO texting promising yet gone against his own promise and banned him knowing we dont give activity Do not use another link on this forum just to prove your accusation make your accusation legit by posting all the necessary details Yahoo62278 provided you to fill, it will always come down to prove on your allegation the details you provide on this thread and if you just rely on another accusations or thread then you are just spamming and rely on hearsay and creating a FUD.

comments.author: dimonstration
comments.body: Try to fix first your attitude and speak calmly so that ever can understand well your case. You don’t need to become aggressive to all criticism and just provide necessary evidence to prove your accusation as legit. Explain how your claim is valid and try to find a way to verify those whatsapp and telegram chat is came from the legit person because it’s easy to create social media account just to impersonate someone. You need a solid proof to prove your accusation online so that people will believe in you. Without proper reporting and evidence, You will not received a single support to your problem. @Twitchyseal is known for fighting scam and fair to handle this kind of issue. Why not cooperate with him and provide what he is asking. He will be a great help if you are telling the truth.
